nodes.author: Bram Kanstein (@bramk)

nodes.excerpt: QLO is a browser-based interactive 3D tool to generate custom clothing mockups. Our 3D digital avatars can fit into your brand, just upload your design, adjust settings and download your images directly in your Browser.
nodes.title: QLO - Generate custom 3D digital clothing mockups in your browser.
nodes.author: Augis Kaleinykas

nodes.excerpt: An open-source UI component library for building high-quality, accessible design systems and web apps.
nodes.title: Radix UI - Open-source UI components for building accessible web apps.
nodes.author: Joe Alongi

nodes.excerpt: Chocolate is sweet but SaaS surprises are sweeter - and we have two a day! At the stroke of midnight SaaS Advent Calendar unlocks an exclusive deal from well-established SaaS companies as well as a free SaaS in beta that needs valuable feedback.
nodes.title: SaaS Advent Calendar 2020 - SaaSanta is coming to town and he's not bringing coal
nodes.author: Alex. Delivet

nodes.excerpt: A members-only club for COVID conscious trip planning and on demand recommendations, curated by our in-the-know community.
nodes.title: The Club by Allcall - COVID conscious trips & on-demand text recs.
nodes.author: Chris Messina
